item.description:
The Original Steppers of Boston have been invited to attend this event and partake in all it's activities. As Steppers we've been asked to "get the party started" when the dance floor opens up.

The event will include a light dinner menu, an awards ceremony, live band and a DJ. The dinner program will run between 7-8:30pm. Entertainment and dancing will continue afterward.

BWA will be highlighting major victories, including the passage of historic CORI reforms, green justice work, and the launch of the Boston Staffing Alliance, Massachusetts’ first CORI friendly temp agency.

Thank you to those for volunteering to participate in the BWA Fundraiser. Gentleman Steven will have our $20 tickets available at the Den on 10/21/10. We'll be seated at a reserved table for 10.


(This is an opportunity to step and network. This is not a TOSOB event. Posted with permissions of BWA)

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Boston Workers Alliance’s 2010 Celebration and Fundraiser
